body_html:
After searching on internet, the problem might comes from PEP 3113 -- Removal of Tuple Parameter Unpacking. According to a post on StackOverflow, the author suggest a fix on this kind of problem,
but I don't know how to execute the unit test (i.e. reader_test.py) on my machine.

Can anyone advice ? For example, do I need to install bazel environment first ?
body_text:
After searching on internet, the problem might comes from PEP 3113 -- Removal of Tuple Parameter Unpacking. According to a post on StackOverflow, the author suggest a fix on this kind of problem,
but I don't know how to execute the unit test (i.e. reader_test.py) on my machine.
Can anyone advice ? For example, do I need to install bazel environment first ?
body:
After searching on internet, the problem might comes from [PEP 3113 -- Removal of Tuple Parameter Unpacking](https://www.python.org/dev/peps/pep-3113/). According to a post on StackOverflow, the author suggest [a fix on this kind of problem](http://stackoverflow.com/questions/11328312/python-lambda-does-not-accept-tuple-argument), 
but I don't know how to execute the unit test (i.e. reader_test.py) on my machine.

Can anyone advice ? For example, do I need to install bazel environment first ?
